::Feline::

She opened her eyes and looked around.  She let out a loud roar. She 
used her claws and ripped through the strapps.  She leaped from the 
table and looked at Zardus. SHe transformed into bot mode. "OK, I WAS 
in the forest walking with two other bot. And now I'm standing here 
talking to you. Care to fill in the peices?" She spread her hand out 
and her claws sprang out showing 4 inch claws. She smiled 
evilly.  "Or do I have to make you talk?"  She put her hand on her 
hip and waited for him to speak.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Allright, one more post.
> 
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus closes Feline's face plate, unattatching the wires he had 
attatched. 
> He had fully reprogrammed her into an Alliance soldier. If the 
programming 
> was successfull (which is up to you to say, Logo), she would follow 
his every 
> command, and serve the Alliance without fail. He had also 
programmed her to 
> be a bit promiscuous, but not a slut like DevilDuer had asked.
> 
> He taps his wrist comp, making sure the connection to the device he 
had 
> implanted, which would clear Feline's programming at his command, 
was secure.
> 
> Zardus picks up the antidote to Reptilica's venom, injecting it 
into Feline. 
> He sits back, waiting for her to wake up.
